title: US hospital told family their daughter had checked out when in fact she'd died
dot:
digraph hospital_saga{node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];subgraph cluster_hospital{label="Mercy San Juan Hospital";hospital[label="Mercy San Juan
Hospital (Sacramento)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];storage_facility[label="Off-site
Storage Facility", shape=box, style=dashed];hospital->storage_facility[label="shipped body
for storage"];}subgraph cluster_family{label="Family of Jessie Peterson";family_search[label="Family spends a year
searching for Jessie", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];hospital_comm[label="Hospital misinforms:
'To have checked out'"];police_search[label="Family contacts police
& coroner"];coroner_found[label="Detective finds Jessie's
body in hospital storage", shape=box];}jessie[label="Jessie Peterson (31)
Died of cardiopulmonary arrest
April 2023", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];family_search->hospital_comm[label="Family informed of discharge"];hospital_comm->family_search;family_search->police_search;police_search->coroner_found;coroner_found->jessie;storage_facility->jessie; lawsuit[label="Lawsuit against Mercy San Juan:
Claims negligence and mishandling
seeking $5M+ in damages", shape=note, style=dotted];jessie->lawsuit;subgraph cluster_outcomes{label="Outcome";outcome[label="Hospital's failure to notify
family of death", shape=parallelogram, style=filled, fillcolor=lightcoral];lawsuit->outcome;}}
